channel.title: Posts on Yui's personal task manager
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Yui's personal task manager

item.title: Yui-cli 1.0.2 released
item.description: pip install yui --upgrade CHANGELOG [2023-02-20] Added MacOS and Windows changes for yui open error handling for random string instead of taskId

item.title: Yui's GUI client 1.0.0-alpha released, dark theme support added
item.description: Light/Dark color scheme detected automatically. Actual look will depend on your system settings. Screenshot was made on KDE with Breeze Dark theme.
